description: Describes existing Aurora Limitless Database DB shard groups.

parameters.name: DBShardGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The user-supplied DB shard group identifier. If this parameter is specified, information for only the specific DB shard group is returned. This parameter isn't case-sensitive. Constraints: If supplied, must match an existing DB shard group identifier.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A filter that specifies one or more DB shard groups to describe. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. The filters supported by a describe operation are documented with the describe operation. The following actions can be filtered: DescribeDBClusterBacktracks DescribeDBClusterEndpoints DescribeDBClusters DescribeDBInstances DescribeDBRecommendations DescribeDBShardGroups DescribePendingMaintenanceActions The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so you can retrieve the remaining results. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100

nested_items.name: DBShardGroups
nested_items.description: Contains a list of DB shard groups for the user.

nested_items.name: DBShardGroupResourceId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region-unique, immutable identifier for the DB shard group.

nested_items.name: DBShardGroupIdentifier
nested_items.description: The name of the DB shard group.

nested_items.name: DBClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The name of the primary DB cluster for the DB shard group.

nested_items.name: MaxACU
nested_items.description: The maximum capacity of the DB shard group in Aurora capacity units (ACUs).

nested_items.name: MinACU
nested_items.description: The minimum capacity of the DB shard group in Aurora capacity units (ACUs).

nested_items.name: ComputeRedundancy
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to create standby DB shard groups for the DB shard group. Valid values are the following:
0 - Creates a DB shard group without a standby DB shard group. This is the default value.
1 - Creates a DB shard group with a standby DB shard group in a different Availability Zone (AZ).
2 - Creates a DB shard group with two standby DB shard groups in two different AZs.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the DB shard group.

nested_items.name: PubliclyAccessible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the DB shard group is publicly accessible.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The connection endpoint for the DB shard group.

nested_items.name: DBShardGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB shard group.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A pagination token that can be used in a later DescribeDBClusters request.
